title: Nullarbor hideout
creator_credit: Australian Children's Television Foundation, Tim Burstall, John Martin-Jones and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: The adventures of a group of children living at Cook on the Nullarbor Plain. They discover a swimming pool in a limestone cave and make the cave their hide-out. The children become involved with kangaroo shooters who are wanted by police for car stealing. Cast includes Tom Burstall, Betty Burstall, David Crocker, Frances Hatham, Marcus Skipper.
